verses.verse: In the beginning <WG746> was the Word, <WG3056> and the Word <WG3056> was with God, <WG2316> and the Word <WG3056> was God. <WG2316>
The same <WG3778> was in the beginning <WG746> with God. <WG2316>
All <WG3956> things were made <WG1096> by him; and without <WG5565> him was not any <WG1520> thing made <WG1096> that was made. <WG1096>
In him was life; <WG2222> and the life <WG2222> was the light <WG5457> of men. <WG444>
And the light <WG5457> shines <WG5316> in darkness; <WG4653> and the darkness <WG4653> comprehended <WG2638> it not.

The same <WG3778> came <WG2064> for a witness, <WG3141> to bear <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of the Light, <WG5457> that all <WG3956> men through <WG1223> him might believe. <WG4100>
He was not that Light, <WG5457> but was sent to bear <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of that Light. <WG5457>
That was the true <WG228> Light, <WG5457> which <WG3739> lights <WG5461> every <WG3956> man <WG444> that comes <WG2064> into <WG1519> the world. <WG2889>

But as many <WG3745> as received <WG2983> him, to them gave <WG1325> he power <WG1849> to become <WG1096> the sons <WG5043> of God, <WG2316> even to them that believe <WG4100> on <WG1519> his name: <WG3686>

And the Word <WG3056> was made <WG1096> flesh, <WG4561> and dwelled <WG4637> among <WG1722> us, (and we beheld <WG2300> his glory, <WG1391> the glory <WG1391> as of the only <WG3439> begotten <WG3439> of the Father, <WG3962>) full <WG4134> of grace <WG5485> and truth. <WG225>

John <WG2491> bore <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of him, and cried, <WG2896> saying, <WG3004> This <WG3778> was he of whom <WG3739> I spoke, <WG2036> He that comes <WG2064> after <WG3694> me is preferred <WG1715> before <WG1715> me: for he was before <WG4413> me.
And of his fullness <WG4138> have <WG2192> all <WG3956> we received, <WG2983> and grace <WG5485> for grace. <WG5485>
For the law <WG3551> was given <WG1325> by Moses, <WG3475> but grace <WG5485> and truth <WG225> came <WG1096> by Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

No <WG3762> man <WG3762> has seen <WG3708> God <WG2316> at <WG4455> any <WG4455> time, <WG4455> the only <WG3439> begotten <WG3439> Son, <WG5207> which <WG3588> is in the bosom <WG2859> of the Father, <WG3962> he has declared <WG1834> him.

And this <WG3778> is the record <WG3141> of John, <WG2491> when <WG3753> the Jews <WG2453> sent <WG649> priests <WG2409> and Levites <WG3019> from Jerusalem <WG2414> to ask <WG2065> him, Who <WG5101> are <WG1488> you?

And they asked <WG2065> him, What <WG5101> then? <WG3767> Are <WG1488> you Elias? <WG2243> And he said, <WG3004> I am <WG1510> not. Are <WG1488> you that prophet? <WG4396> And he answered, <WG611> No. <WG3756>
Then <WG3767> said <WG2036> they to him, Who <WG5101> are <WG1488> you? that we may give <WG1325> an answer <WG612> to them that sent <WG3992> us. What <WG5101> say <WG3004> you of yourself? <WG4572>

John <WG2491> answered <WG611> them, saying, <WG3004> I baptize <WG907> with water: <WG5204> but there stands <WG2476> one among <WG1722> <WG5216> you, whom <WG3739> you know <WG1492> not;

These <WG5023> things were done <WG1096> in Bethabara <WG962> beyond <WG4008> Jordan, <WG2446> where <WG3699> John <WG2491> was baptizing. <WG907>

The next <WG1887> day <WG1887> John <WG2491> sees <WG991> Jesus <WG2424> coming <WG2064> to him, and said, <WG3004> Behold <WG2396> the Lamb <WG286> of God, <WG2316> which <WG3588> takes <WG142> away the sin <WG266> of the world. <WG2889>

And I knew <WG1492> him not: but that he should be made <WG5319> manifest <WG5319> to Israel, <WG2474> therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> am I come <WG2064> baptizing <WG907> with water. <WG5204>

And John <WG2491> bore <WG3140> record, <WG3140> saying, <WG3004> I saw <WG2300> the Spirit <WG4151> descending <WG2597> from heaven <WG3772> like <WG5616> a dove, <WG4058> and it stayed <WG3306> on him.

And I saw, <WG3708> and bore <WG3140> record <WG3140> that this <WG3778> is the Son <WG5207> of God. <WG2316>
Again <WG3825> the next <WG1887> day <WG1887> after <WG1887> John <WG2491> stood, <WG2476> and two <WG1417> of his disciples; <WG3101>
And looking <WG1689> on Jesus <WG2424> as he walked, <WG4043> he said, <WG3004> Behold <WG2396> the Lamb <WG286> of God! <WG2316>
And the two <WG1417> disciples <WG3101> heard <WG191> him speak, <WG2980> and they followed <WG190> Jesus. <WG2424>

Then <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> turned, <WG4762> and saw <WG2300> them following, <WG190> and said <WG3004> to them, What <WG5101> seek <WG2212> you? They said <WG2036> to him, Rabbi, <WG4461> (which <WG3739> is to say, <WG3004> being interpreted, <WG2059> Master, <WG1320>) where <WG4226> dwell <WG3306> you?

He said <WG3004> to them, Come <WG2064> and see. <WG1492> They came <WG2064> and saw <WG1492> where <WG4226> he dwelled, <WG3306> and stayed <WG3306> with him that day: <WG2250> for it was about <WG5613> the tenth <WG1182> hour. <WG5610>
One <WG1520> of the two <WG1417> which <WG3588> heard <WG191> John <WG2491> speak, and followed <WG190> him, was Andrew, <WG406> Simon <WG4613> Peter's <WG4074> brother. <WG80>

He first <WG4413> finds <WG2147> his own brother <WG80> Simon, <WG4613> and said <WG3004> to him, We have found <WG2147> the Messias, <WG3323> which <WG3739> is, being interpreted, <WG3177> the Christ. <WG5547>

Jesus <WG2424> saw <WG1492> Nathanael <WG3482> coming <WG2064> to him, and said <WG3004> of him, Behold <WG2396> an Israelite <WG2475> indeed, <WG230> in whom <WG3739> is no <WG3756> guile! <WG1388>

Nathanael <WG3482> said <WG3004> to him, From where <WG4159> know <WG1097> you me? Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> to him, Before <WG4253> that Philip <WG5376> called <WG5455> you, when you were <WG5607> under <WG5259> the fig <WG4808> tree, <WG4808> I saw <WG1492> you.
